text: The Spiritual Companions Trust is a UK educational charity. Its main focus is on developing courses and resources in the field of a holistic and person- centred approach to spirituality and wellness. It was instituted by the English Charity Commission as a Charitable Incorporated Organisation No. 1155777 in 2015 . It was previously a project of the Foundation for Holistic Spirituality CIC. In 2016 it worked with the awarding organisation Crossfields Institute to develop the Level 3 Diploma in Practical Spirituality and Wellness, the first qualification in the field to be regulated by Ofqual. == References == * * * * Category:Educational charities based in the United Kingdom
title: Spiritual Companions Trust
